Rowdy Wolf:




For a few moments, Rowdy Wolf watched Zyber at the corner of his eyes. He 
moved over, not turning his yellow glowing optics to her. He walked to the 
cold dark mark in the front-middle of the cave that was the empty fireplace. 
On his way to it, he hummed a low Maximal song that he knew. He gathered 
varied sized pieces of wood from the side of the cave.

"Are you staying?" he asked Zyber.
